title: Sound quality is as usual good. But why is the design is somewhat bulged ...
Audio was good while it
Above average, comfortable earphone that died way too early.
Best budget Inearphone for bass lovers
First copy of JBL,please dont buy folks
Awesome product
Do not buy by just looking at WARRANTY period
Best budget earphones
Value for money
A Quality Product by JBL! Must Purchase!!
review:
This is my second headset from JBL. Sound quality is as usual good. But why is
the design is somewhat bulged and mic very low need to hold in your hands
while you speak.In my old headset there is little provision to adjust the
length of the wires in left and right side.Wires are also very thin some for
rough use it may damage. I dont know why this is missing.Brought it for Rs 899
with 10% cash back offer. Felt I have spent extra 300 on trusting the brand
blindly.

Bought this in July 2016 (for 750₹) and after some heavy usage with Audiobooks
in the past 2 months one side has stopped working..  
The connector got damaged by repeated stresses in a tight pocket (5.5 inch
phone)..  
Audio was good while it lasted

The base is quite good, the treble is too sharp for my liking. Don't know
about the longevity of the product.  
  
However any pressure on the wire leads to excess noise in the ear. So, you
need to care about that.  
  
The best quality about these earphones are they are extremely snug within the
ear, I used to run wearing this earphones, it felt light and comfortable.  
  
Not awesome, but above average earphones. It died too early for a 700 bucks
piece.  
  
Edit. Stopped working after 4 months of usage. Getting to JBL service centre
is so much of a hassle I just got a new earphone from a different company.

First impression is good of this jbl c100si in earphone. Just got delivered
today and sound is amazing. Specially the bass is good. This Best budget
earphone cost me as low as 700 rs only. Time to test it and i will again
review it on amazon within couple of months!!

Mainly while listening it is creating harmonic distortions, chinese headphones
r better .I ordered it and got a used piece but thanks to amazon got it
replaced. I used the new replaced piece for 2 days and realised its a first
copy of jbl, no warranty card, no additional buds and producing harmonics
while listening music. I suggest not to go with GMT mart and this product is
waste of money.

Good quality product with good bass. 4-star coz missing out noise cancellation
feature. Good shopping with Amazon they have maintained their level here.

Few things you should know before buying it. The warranty they have given is a
scam. Let me tell you how. In a country of 1.3 billion population, they(JBL)
have only 4 repairing centers and all in major cities. So if it stops working
after some time they will waste your time via mails for at least few weeks and
in the end they will give you address for their centers saying go and repair
and yes you will responsible for all type of expenses involved. Unless you are
living near a repairing center, you would rather buy a new one.  
  
For me it worked well for 6 months and then one of it's side suddenly stopped
working and next day other one did the same. I contacted them but they are
never any help.

Very Good base compared to senhiser CX 180 .  
Vocaliser may not be too good as compared to senhiser  
I bought it for 650/-(you won't get this cheap at any special offer/festival)  
Worth price , wait for some offer day price get reduce to around 700 . It also
fell in water but still after drying it nothing happed it still working as new
as when it arrived

excellent sound quality. base as well as highs both are good. bought it for
725/- so for this price point these are good ones.

I'll get to the point straightly.  
  
~Box Contents: A pair of earphones, a warranty and, a safety note  
~Build Quality: Seems to be slightly delicate  
~Compatibility: Windows, Android, and iOS (Not sure about MacOS and Linux)  
~Sound Quality: Adequate, might experience crackling sound if used in high
volume  
~Mic: Yes (At the division of the wire)  
~Bass: Medium  
~Lenght: nearly 100 cm  
  
Go for these if you want a balanced sound experience

review:
JBL C100SI Average product in proper price range.  
Although I felt lesser output when compared with basic Mi Basic headsets. I
know! some of them may have suggestion to change the headphone settings and
then check the output and all.  
I felt Rs.599 headset of MI is little better than this but JBL has an upper
hand as its fit in the ear which is nice and will not ache your ears whereas
Mi headset will do for a while util you are use to it. Happy with the product.
Hope it is durable enough!

Amazing sound quality with best price range. The bass and noise cancellation
features are quite remarkable with robust build quality.  
Would definitely recommend the product to others who wish to get the best
value for their money within 1000 bucks.  
  
Amazon again lived up well to my expectations in terms of delivery.

Found it to be a bit overrated and overpriced. I have used the Sennheiser CX
Street II earphones as well and it has much better sound quality. Only CON is
that doesnt have a microphone. This earphone is good but not worth the
excessive price. Got it for INR799 but the same day it was selling for INR699
on the official website harmanaudio.in. So make sure you check the price on
other websites before buying it from Amazon

Best earphone ....its better then my Sony MDR xb50 ...really loved it u should
surely buy it best product ..bass 9/10 treble9/10 and sound quality 10/10 its
jbl by Harman bro go for it u will not regret it at all.......also got it at
700 rs on lightning deal thanks amazon for best deal and shipping....... Have
fun with these earphone guys

Best at this price, treble and bass are balanced, I bought both shenheizer and
jbl, the price of former was 599,without microphone, but latter exceeds a step
ahead with microphone, also not going technically, in simple words if you want
to enjoy light and sweet music, with balanced treble and bass, blindly go with
this jbl in ear headphone.

Not impressive...sound quality is not good, it cannot produce clear sound
output at high frequencies!! Very dissatisfied. Bass is not good, noise
cancelation though very well. Built quality very poor as far as the brand name
is concerned. Not comparable with Sennheiser cx180 which is far better than
this mediocre earphone!

Good earphone under 1k.little difference between Sennheiser 180 and jbl
c100si.Sennheiser hv better sound quality than jbl.but jbl provide mic which
has advantage.but sound quality improve by music player app .i am using pi
music app.which is enhance its quality. i hv earlier Sennheiser 180.but
unfortunately i lost it.my recommendation between two is jbl.

Just buy if you are a BASS music lover. Sound quality is good as well. I just
brought it @899 it is not worth for this price, @699 is fine.  
I preferred Google play music to get actual bass & quality of the product (on
Mi A1).  
  
\----Pros  
1\. Deep bass  
2\. Clear sound  
3\. Mic & button for manage calls & music (play/pause, next/prev).  
4\. Light weight & small.  
  
\--Cons  
1\. After 1 hr of continuous use, your ear will got pain. Too hard ear buds.  
2\. Average quality of wire, not Tangle-free.

Good set of earphones, although the finish is somehwat unsatisfactory as
certain sharp protrusions exist on the earpiece. Also, when the product was
delivered the seal was broken, and the warranty card missing. It's working so
far, so no complaints yet.

Not a good quality  
Stop working after 3 months

review:
This is a great in ear headphone. Works pretty well with my iPhone. The sound
is amazing. The sound quality won't make you feel that it's a cheap headphone.
I felt the sound is at par with my friend's klipsch headphones( that was worth
3k) and even my friend was surprised with the quality. In addition, the
headphones come with 3 sizes of caps for ear plugs as well. That's a good
thing since don't know why the caps on my ear plug come out often. Guys you
can go for it.

Worth for the price @Rs.699  
  
I wonder where the product is made from !! Is it USA or CHINA ?? Check the pix
!!  
  
received it today oly !! works well !! hope it works the same for long !!

Got defect in product in just 3 months & even worst part is that there is no
JBL Customer Care number working in India. JBL Website doesn't correct contact
number & mail contact is even not working & got to know JBL Service Centre is
closed in Delhi NCR & no longer available to claim warranty. Really not sure
why JBL is selling product in this area if doesn't have any customer service
center or contact number.

Earphones stopped working within 6 months. Even though it's within warranty,
the service provided by Harman is worst. You have to send the product to
service center in Chennai, Bangalore or Delhi, that too after contacting them
multiple times and then you have to wait for months to get the product back,
if at all.

Poor Quality one side headset not hearing after 6 months. I bought 4 headsets.
But the 4 headsets is not working after 6-9 months. warranty is there for one
year but how to claim is not clearly mentioned. Seller r Product defect.
Amazon please review.

Hi I bought this product on the belief of brand Value, Sound quality is
OK..but the mic is having problem, its not working, the voice is not reachable
to the person on other end. In addition the Mic button is also not working.
Its only 2 weeks passed bought from Amazon. Both the company Amazon and JBL
has such brand value , however the product selling is very pathetic and
unsatisfactory. I will post this review on social network as well. Either the
Amazon is selling duplicate product on the name of JBL or JBL has decreased
the making quality product. Don't buy any electronic product from Amazon .

Using this for last 3 months... Very nice sound quality... affordable price
699... the cord is actually tangled free... the tangled free cord thing
surprisingly works... I had doubts but headphone sound turned out to be
great... JBL never disappoints ... I accidentally drove my car over the
headphones ... after that incident, it is currently little beat up... left
side has low sound but surprisingly it still works ... that proved the build
quality is tough... because I used it roughly, I eventually have to buy a new
one soon... so I am buying the same again... hoping this product gets
discount. waiting waiting

Rcvd the earphone just nw, I got them at a festive price of 699. These
earphones are really awesome. I was previously using the Sennheiser CX213.
This product isn't any less compared to the sennheiser, I must say! Specially
the bass is better than cx213. Also, it has got a Mike which is missing in the
cx213. Overall satisfied with this. Now lets wait and see it is robust or not,
as my cx213 lasted for entirely 3 years since my purchase and it broke down
only after a mice tore down its wires! Will post again after using it for a
month or so..

This is arguably the best in-earphones with mic you can get for less than 1K.
That honour previously belonged to the Cowon EM1. This goes a step higher.
They fit perfectly in my ear and are very light n comfortable for long hours.
The sound is balanced with fairly distinct highs, lows n mids reproduction.
The bass is abundant yet tight. Wires are a little thin n seem delicate but
there has been no noticeable wear n tear even after months of usage. I picked
them for Rs 599. Simply brilliant for that price. Just go for it without a
second thought if you spot it for Rs 900 or less.

Simple review based on Amazon's two top selling eraphones boat 225 and
JBL100si  
1)Boat bass head 235  
Pros  
Excellent pricing  
Good build quality  
Good bass  
Durable  
Cons  
Often earbud comes out ear  
Sound purists don't like  
Mids are not that greate  
Extra bass(con or pro According to you)  
Heavy weight  
  
2)JBL 100si  
Pros  
Balanced sound  
Light weight  
Comfortable  
Good sound quality  
Sound puriat prefer this over boat  
  
Cons  
Decent build. Boat has better build and cheaper price  
Costs more  
  
Summary  
If you are on a tight budget and want good sound you can go with boat.
Eventhough it has extra bass. It's good earphone.  
If you want more pure sound then go with JBL. It is not the most pure sound.
But it is good. And little bass is boost. Which is good. I am giving second
place to JBL under 1000rs .

I have been using this earphone for about two weeks now and here are my
comments:  
  
PROS:  
1\. Good quality for this price. (Rs. 699)  
2\. Mic works fine while moving.  
3\. Overall quality is good.  
  
CONS:  
1\. The quality of insulation is not that good and may tear with rough use.  
2\. Earbuds slip out of your ears easily.  
  
CONCLUSION:  
If you intend to buy an earphone below 1,000 rupee, go for this one.

Value for money.. initially took time to adjust with the buds because this are
my first earphones but now it has been a week and they are quite comfortable
and the bass is amazing.. overall in the price range this is the best deal. Go
for it if you are spending under 1k and need a mic.

Build quality is nice and sound to is very good only one thing that I would
like to change is the microphone position which should be near left corner but
is placed in middle so while talking you have to hold it continously.

review:
Not a very good product,as per some of the reviews i thought this product
might be the classy one.  
An average product in this budget.  
You will get two extra ear buds. The tiny one is best for the bass effect and
the largest one will gave good treble output.

It's good in-ear earphones. If we compare it with creative Ep 630 then
creative is much better than this jbl. It also depends on your mobile phone. I
tried in so many brands like mi, sony, samsung . Result was different for each
brand best i got in Samsung note series or premium series.  
If you try it for some lower range mobile then you can't feel the jbl quality.  
Overall it's good choice

I've been using this earphones for more than 6 months and still works
perfectly fine.. doesn't get entangled which usually is the case.. built
quality looks delicate but it definitely isn't. Amazing sound quality and
performance with proper noise cancellation..!!

Decent ear phone for this price. However the bass is a bit on the lower side.
I also use a Panasonic ear phone which cost me way less than this product but
has excellent bass & better hearing quality that this item. Otherwise, OK for
this price.

it is more than good for its price range.......but not ad good as cx130.....if
u are good with no mic and button then just go with cx130 else u can buy
this...it has great highs and good bass...better comfortability as the
ergonomics is great...all the edges are rounded

Many people says that this earphone is similar to sennheiser cx 180..... but
honestly speaking this one is much more better than sennheiser cx180. I have
used both of them ... but i think the base of the c100si (c150si) is little
bit louder than cx180. The mid of the cx180 is little bit better than this
product. And the vocal is almost equal. But the basic difference is this
earphone comes with a mic. But there is no mic on sennheiser cx 180. Therefore
I must suggest u this earphone in this range.👌

Best product in this price range. Got it on a Lightening Deal in just 699, and
the earphones are just perfect. Deep bass and balanced treble.

You'll have a lot of doubts before buying it. You will also go though many
reviews before buying it.  
  
I got it for 799rs and that is value for money. That's the best review you can
say.  
You'll get the sound quality that you expect from JBL. Maybe the best one with
mic you can get for this price. Better than all those headphones you get along
with your phones.  
  
Expect the quality that you get with the headphones of an apple iPod (for
those who have tried them.

The sound quality is good,noise isolation is perfect (it's little bit good
than my previous earphone which was boat 220).  
Although the earphone lacks tangle-free cable and premium look which my boat
220 had.  
Build quality is good.I bought it recently ,so don't much abt life etc.The
buds fits perfectly in ear for better experience as my boat 220 fell every
10-15 min from ear.  
  
Overall it's good just lacks look and tangle-free cable

Good earphones with a below average build quality (sound quality is good
though). I don,t expect the plastic cords to last for more than an year on an
average use.. This was the very reason that I had to order a new earphone.

review:
Bought this after 2 years of using 2 sennheiser cx 180 earphones they both
stopped working one side after a year of use. This earphones have a slightly
better sound quality than cx180 and these have microphone also so it's a plus
point. Bass is also somewhat better than cx180. So whoever got bored with
cx180 these are the better option to go for.

Hi, first of all I will tell you one thing..JBL by Harman is the world top
leading brand..and Harman is producing the product with always world best
class.awesone sound quality., Bass effect, terrible quality all are
perfect.wire is tingle free.i got this item in offer as 699 INR , under this
range I got best product.even mic is awesome.blindly can go and use this..

This small package is pure bliss for your ears.  
I have been using this for the past 4 months and the experience is just mind-
blowing.  
Once you get addicted to these awesome pair of earbuds you'll find other
earphones and headphones a bit "feeka".  
Initially the earphones don't sound as good but after a few hours of
"breaking-in" the bass and the punches are really on point!!  
One small con is that these tangle easily. And also the wire is thin so it
seems that they may break easily though it may not be real case.  
But at this price point and even much much higher these are best ones I have
heard in a long long time.

Jbl C100SI is one of the best headphones.  
I’ve used sennheiser cx180 street 2 for almost 4 years & the sound quality was
great on that but this earphone is also very good.  
Sound quality is very good but I didn’t got any extra ear tips I don’t know
why.  
Bass is good, not so punching or very powerful but it’s okay whenever it’s
needed, most importantly it has a microphone which is quite good. While
calling someone, the other party never complained.  
Best for buy  
Worth for money  
If you want decent quality earphones then go for it.  
In the price point of 700 it’s a very good earphone.

Purchased in a lightnjng deal for 650 rupees and it was a grab. Before I
finally manage to lose them, the earphones worked brilliantly for the first 6
months and were just incredible at below 800 rupees category. The sound was
balanced and bass rich. However the bass never seemed to be too much to muffle
other frequencies. The earphones delivered crisp sound and the in line
microphone was clear and responsive.  
  
The build vould have been a notch better, however these, according to me were
the best value for money product at this price. Any complaints are absolute
nit-pickings.

This product is not registered on jbl . You can check by serial no by call jbl
0008000401973.  
So i doubt that this product original or fake.  
It is only brand name's rupees otherwise in market u can get this typ of
earphones around 300to400.

I bought this headphones JBL C100SI In-Ear Headphones with Mic (Black) on 6th
February. The product seems to be fake and the sound quality is horrible. In
fact there is no quality in the sound so; it would be a shame if I even write
sound quality together while describing it. Requested replacement as it
doesn't allow me to request for refund in the order but the second one also is
same. So; it's not a defect but the product is made that way. No credibility
of a JBL branded product.  
  
Please collect the product and refund my money. No more buying electronics
from Amazon. Let my buying be limited to books as it has been.

Quality seems to be Average or rather poor considering the price tag. If you
actually like listening good sound/music, better think again for this
earphone. I found my default Samsung earphones, normally which come with
phones, better than this. Not worth of spending this much amount just because
of unnecessary hype.

Awesome sound quality, value for money!!
review:
After a thorough search on leading online portals I bought JBL c100SI
heasphobe. Having used it for the past 10 days, I really enjoyed it. The sound
quality is amazing. Noice cancellation is outstanding. Enjoying music /
attending a call even at the noisest place is smooth. Thanks JBL & Amazon for
the product. I recommend the product.

Good earphone as this price range. Thou as promised in the details the bass
isnt that great. If you are a bass lover then this might not be for you (go
for sennheiser cx100). But if u want are looking for sound quality and clear
audio like me go for this earphone. i would give an overall score of 8/10 for
this earphone. a better choice for a cheap budget is audio technica clr100.

Ordered three times....I just love them....Once Misplaced...Second time my pup
destroyed them...But can't get over it so got them third time too......Just
great sound......

At first, I wasn't very satisfied with the product. The bass was quite
satisfactory and not up to the level I was expecting. It took me a few weeks
to appreciate the output the earphones offered. Either it could be due to the
increased burn-in or I just got used to it.  
Overall:  
Bass: 8.5/10  
Treble: 7.5/10  
Mids: 8/10  
Noise cancellation: 7/10  
Mic quality: 9/10  
Build quality: 7/10  
Comfort: 9/10 (The lightest and best fitting pair of earphones I've worn so
far)

I bought this earphone in December 2016. But it stopped working in June 2017
(within 6 months). Since it was under 1-year warranty, I went to the service
center at Grant Road, Mumbai. Within 1 week they replaced my earphone and gave
me brand new JBL C150SI in-ear earphones. Thus I am very happy with the after
sells service.  
As far as the earphones are concerned, I love both C100SI and C150SI. They
both produce balanced sound as required by me.

awsome ear phones the only thing missing is the base.The base is low i mean
not very much low but if little more base is added i will satisfy 100 % base
lovers will slightly disappointed.vocals and treble are very good

I bought this product seeing so many positive reviews. But within 2 weeks
audio output became very less from left side earpiece. Taken it to the service
Centre but got older version headphone as replacement!

#Build Quality- 7/10 ( doesn't have flat cables, and I noticed that while
using it used to get tangled often)  
  
#Bass- 8/10 (many people are interested in the bass of this. Here, the bass is
not overpowering. Although it is there when you need the punch from the
audio.)  
  
#vocals and mids- 7/10 (Bit of a mixed bag here. I noticed that the vocals
were crisper while using the earphones with my Laptop. But when using it with
my smartphone, the vocals were a little low in crispiness.)

Sound quality is good..... Actually better than expected ...Bass is clear...No
complaints regarding audio quality but cable wires seems of low quality....Bit
on a harder side and can't take high flexes .....The buds seem to be a bit
rough but you'll get used (you will get 2 sets extra buds)...

Awesome sound quality, pretty good built in and quite comfortable as well as
fit easily in ears. The 3.5mm jack is gold plated so that's gonna last long,
the quality of the wire is pretty good its feel strong but not that hard to
make you uncomfortable so that's great. You get 3 ear buds S M & L to fit
according to your comfort. I would say totally value for money.😊

I ve bought this in January, The product worked very well for 7 months, then
volume in one of the left side reduced while right side still worked fine, now
it completely stopped working on left side while very low volume is being
heard from the right. I tried calling the call center using number mentioned
but it says invalid number.

Been using it for quite sometime now and its working awesome. Value for money
and the listeners on the otherside dont have any complaint on the noise and
disturbances. Another good quality product from JBL.

Super awesome .... bought @699/- but every penny is worth it .  
The bass is way beyond its price . Being a first time JBL user , I am actually
highly highly impressed .  
A MUST BUY , affordable and super awesome

Writing review after almost 1 year of usage. Still these headphones are
rocking. No distortion in sound, can here clearly all crispy beats with full
bass. Button with Mic is very handy and works seamlessly with Poweramp music
player allowing me control playlists on presses. Best headphones in market.

The bass of the earphones is not good.If you are a bass lover you will
definitely hate it.  
The vocals are average and treble is not good.  
The build quality is in between average and good.The quality of the mic is
good.  
The overall audio quality is poor and not clear.  
If you are at a budget below 1000 go for sennheiser CX180.Those are very good
earphone for the price range below Rs.1000  
Rating:Build quality: 3.5  
Bass:2.5  
Vocals:2  
Sound quality and clarity:2  
overall:2

Everything went well until somehow one earphone started producing low voice.I
think there's something wrong with JBL products.The plastic used for JBL j88
was also of low quality.Anyways,bad experience with JBL.

review:
Best earphones in its price range .Good sound but mic lags in grabbing voice
but Otherwise its worth for money.

The perfect bass and clarity comes in packed with it, it really persnofies
sound and makes music more pleasing to listen.  
The bass buds ensure it that every aspect of the music gets into your ear with
speculation.

For this price segement, this earphone is the best. Apart from this earphone,
I own Sennheiser 275s, Sennheiser CX180 and JBL T100A. This earphone is way
better than JBL T100A and competes well with Sennheiser CX 180. If your are
thinking of one to buy between CX 180 an JBL C100SI, I would recommend the JBL
ones as you get a mic as well.

Trebles are too high even with equalizer controls, bass is not good just
missing the depth of feeling. I didn't expectJBL earphones to be so pathetic
sound. No in ear noise proper cancellation..

I have been using these headphones for 6 months now and for everything from
phone calls, video calls on laptop, play music while working out or sleeping
etc. They have performed very well and have lasted a lot of rough usage (which
might sound impossible given it's delicate looking build quality).  
If you are looking for basic earphones with decent sound quality, reliable
brand and on a budget, this would be good option.

This headphones have got great bass but , the overall voice is not up to the
standard. It gets overpowered by its bass which is the only drawback. Nice
body , in the ear system , mi is not that good. If you couldn't afford more
than this , go with this .. else try for something better.

After using it for 1 year im saying this.. Product was good sound quality is
good and clear but it stopped working after 6 mnts.. And it is a big task to
claim the warranty .. Although its a big company they not even respond u
properly.. I tried to claim my warranty but they not even attend the calls or
respond to my mails.. So.. If u wanna buy it irrespective of the warranty it's
good to buy..

I have previously used the JBL T100A and when I switched to c100si I feel that
the bass is a bit low in this one but the sound clarity is good.You can
definitely buy this one if you're more inclined to a balanced or neutral sound
tone.If you're a bass head then I would recommend you to buy Sennheiser CX180
which has good bass.

This product is quite decent with good sound quality. Not really recommend if
you are looking for outstanding experience because there are many other brands
offering much better quality sound quality for similar price range.

Decent sound quality with hard type bass and clear treble.  
One drawback is the earpods are tough and may be uncomfortable for some people

Average
if you want rock music the jbl lacks little bit behind for extra bass but quite it is good product go for
Matching with my Bose and apple headphone
Not very happy!
Nice product
The Good Earphone By JBL

review:
Recommendable no doubt..  
Today I got this product..I'm completely satisfied.  
I have HTC desire 816 and with this phone this JBL earphone is rocking, great
balanced sound productivity.  
You will feel decent bass which is more than enough, no vibration at all in
ears, trouble does match with bass, you will feel stereo effect as per song.  
once it fixed in your ear then forget about the surround noise and moreover,
if you are using for long time, you won't feel irritation.  
First experience with JBL with great one earphone in reasonable price. loved
it!! super job JBL.

They pain my ears after regular use (binge watching 2 tv shows on netflix).
Sound is nice. Decent if you want good sound but I found it too uncomfortable
for long usage. Also remember you can't use them while eating or moving, the
buds pop out of your ears.

Awesome one.. Mic quality is too good... Bass quality as well.. Looking
forward for the best performance...  
the sound is quite smooth for soft music, if you want rock music the jbl lacks
little bit behind for extra bass but quite it is good product go for it

Excellent clarity and bass output. On the very same day received a Bose and
apple headphone from my sister as gifts, but this product matched with their
output, but may be bass wise sony headphones do tend to beat them all but Sony
headphones can't be heard for a long time due to its immense bass output.  
Moreover received the product within 2 days.

I am not sure if the product failed to deliver as I got it on a discount sale.  
The speaker is quite good.. i am extremely happy when I listen to music, but i
bought this piece not only for music but also to help me while i make calls.  
The mic and speaker is quite bad and at times I cant hardly heat whats
happening at the other end. Nor can my voice be heard. And this isnt happening
always.  
I noticed this only after the exchange time had elapsed. I am not even sure if
an exchange was allowed or not.  
For electronic products like these, a minimum window of 1 month should be
given so that the user gets time to identify a flaw, if any!

Writing after two month use,  
Initially seemed little bad because I was used to using Sony mdr xb50ex
series, but after few hours of playing,it got better.bass is not as good as
Sony headphones but still it's almost there, treble and everything else is
better than Sony and value for money, go for it blindly .

Perfectly balanced sound and crystal clarity.  
Sound 9/10  
Bass 7/10  
Treble 9/10  
Build quality 8/10  
Noise cancellation is pretty good.

I have bought two of these now and sound quality is amazing especially the
bass. Another advantage is that unlike other earphones there are too bulky,
you can put these on while wearing a helmet because of its compact size.

Nice sound. If turn on 80% volume on my phone then I can not hear outside
noise at all. But downside is that my music which is being played can be heard
outside if a person is sitting next to me.

One of the best earphones I have used thus far. Didn't even knew my favourite
songs contained the bass and the beats within them until I heard it using
this. Good purchase, JBL rocks.🤘  
Amazon is awesome as always.❤
